availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Preston R. Pattie (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Sneed Preston on January 19, 1843. Father of James L. Pattie, John T. Pattie, and William H. Pattie. Married Elizabeth Robinson Pattie on November 6, 1851. Father of Henry J. Pattie, Sally Pattie, and Joseph Pattie. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved people in 1860. Employed as a farmer in Benson, Kentucky in 1870.
